snippet: An effort to modernize a logistics management system is canceled after six years and a cost of more than $1 billion.
abstract: Randall Stross Digital Domain column observes that United States Air Force's effort to modernize logistics management system is canceled after six years and cost of more than $1 billion; holds that record of software modernization at Defense Dept is discouraging.
lead_paragraph: An effort to modernize a logistics management system is canceled after six years and a cost of more than $1 billion.

headline.seo: Air Force Stumbles Over Software Modernization Project
headline.main: Billion-Dollar Flop: Air Force Stumbles on Software Plan
headline.print_headline: Billion-Dollar Flop: Air Force Stumbles On Software Plan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
